text.autoconfig.ean.option.altitudeDeter: Set to true if you want to elytra flight be faster at higher altitudes.
If set to false, your flight speed will be determined by the minimal speed.
text.autoconfig.ean.option.minSpeed.@Too: Minimal flight speed achieved by travelling at a zero degree angle.
The default value is the vanilla value.
text.autoconfig.ean.option.maxSpeed.@Too: Maximum flight speed achieved by travelling at a zero degree angle.
text.autoconfig.ean.option.minHeight.@To: Altitude at which flight speed starts to increase.
text.autoconfig.ean.option.maxHeight.@To: Altitude at which flight speed stops to increase.
text.autoconfig.ean.option.sneakingReali: When true, sneaking mid-flight will realign your pitch.
Pitch angle at which the player will align when sneaking mid-flight.
text.autoconfig.ean.option.realignRate.@: Amount of rotation at which the player will realign towards the pitch realignment angle.
